items.text: fired full on the pads, worked to deep square leg
items.shortText: Markram to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: drifts in a long way, Shakib looks to tuck it square, gets an inside edge that rolls to short fine
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: lobs off the pad to the leg side as he looks for a delicate little tap
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: eased with the spin to long-off
items.postText: Ngidi off the field for over an hour now. Wonder what's brewing there. Will keep you guys updated.
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: off a thick edge! Races past slip. This is a googly which Shakib looks to ease behind point, gets the edge to run away to the third man boundary
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: bunts it down the ground for an easy single
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: drilled into the gap at wide long-off, touch too full from Tahir
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: gets well forward and smothers this tossed up delivery
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: walks across and sweeps this from middle and off to deep square, opened up the gap nicely. Hit it all along the ground
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: dabs it with the turn to short third man
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Isam informs me from The Oval that Ngidi has tweaked his hamstring and is off the field hence
items.text: driven back to the bowler
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: toe-ends a pull to long-on, this one kept a touch low
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: steps out and lofts to clear the infield. Wanted to hit it over mid-off, but ended up slicing it over cover. Not convincing but runs nonetheless. Long-off came inside the ring, hence the urge to step out. Loops away to the boundary
items.shortText: Markram to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: digs this out, down to long-on. Was fired full and flat
items.shortText: Markram to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: eased down to long-on
items.shortText: Markram to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: pulls this into the leg side
items.shortText: Markram to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: WATCH - #SAvBAN LIVE on Hotstar (Available to viewers in India only)
items.text: angles one in from wide of the crease, defended
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: width and he crashes this Sehwag style to deep point. Got right on top of the bounce
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: dabs this down to third man
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: driven straight to extra cover
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: slants one back into middle and leg, worked to deep backward square leg
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: pulled all along the ground to deep square leg
items.postText: ESPNcricinfo's Forecaster predicts Bangladesh to finish with 328 at this stage
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: rocks back and slaps this to the extra cover boundary. Acres of open space between deep point and long-off. Poor ball first up from JP
items.shortText: Duminy to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: cut away to deep point for an easy single
items.shortText: Duminy to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Update on Ngidi: Being treated for a left hamstring problem.
items.text: drifts in from around the stumps, defended back
items.shortText: Duminy to Shakib Al Hasan, no run
